textAfterTable: - Close this Dhupguri (DQG), Bhagalpur (BGP), Malda Town (MLDT), Kishanganj (KNE), New Jalpaiguri (NJP) and Katihar Jn (KIR) are 6 nearby train stations connected to Kolkata. Kolkata to Kishanganj Trains      Trains to Kishanganj depart from 2 stations in Kolkata: Sealdah (SDAH) and Howrah Jn (HWH)      Related: Kishanganj to Siliguri No Train Departure Arrival Duration Running Days 1 Kanchanjanga Ex (15657) 06:35 AM (Sealdah) 04:15 PM (Kishanganj) 9h 40m All Days 2 Puri Kyq Expres (15643) 07:30 AM (Howrah Jn) 05:23 PM (Kishanganj) 9h 53m Sun 3 Guwahati Exp (12509) 11:15 AM (Howrah Jn) 07:31 PM (Kishanganj) 8h 16m Fri, Sat & Sun
